column5: A buddy and I took advantage of the weather yesterday to go after some Rainbows.  Got lucky and landed two for the dinner plate, which I am quite looking forward to (beautiful orange meat). I lost another one and had two other follows.  Only two bass were caught. I guess I will be putting the boat away this weekend. :-(
Nice!  How bout that weather though???  Nice troots!!!
Very nice been awhile since I have caught a rainbow.
Nice size! I assume those were inland bows? Looks like a nice spot!  S.
Beauties Jimmer! Those are big bows.
Very decent bows for sure!  The rainbow bite has been great lately!  How were you catching them?  We usually use small harnesses and a worm slow trolled over deep water (30-50 ft)
Yes it was an inland lake.  We caught them on twister tails with a bit of worm following the shore. Seems like it happened weeks ago with the change in weather.
